parental_guides.description: The film includes some scenes with implied sexual content and instances of nudity, which are not overtly graphic but are noticeable.
This movie contains several fight scenes with intense action and gore. The violence depicted is graphic and may not be suitable for sensitive viewers.
Characters occasionally use strong language, including expletives and profane expressions, though not pervasive throughout the movie.
The film portrays limited use of alcohol and smoking, reflecting the social habits of some characters without glorifying substance use.
Several scenes are designed to build suspense and may be frightening to younger audiences, including moments of surprise and tension.
